Description:
Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) child process

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Child Process Of Wermgr.EXE
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\wermgr.exe' and (process_path like '%\cmd.exe' or process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\ipconfig.exe' or process_path like '%\mshta.exe' or process_path like '%
et.exe' or process_path like '%
et1.exe' or process_path like '%
etstat.exe' or process_path like '%
slookup.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell_ise.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%egsvr32.exe' or process_path like '%undll32.exe' or process_path like '%\systeminfo.exe' or process_path like '%\whoami.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe')) and  not (process_path like '%undll32.exe' and (command like '%c:\windows\system32\werconcpl.dll%' and command like '%launchercapp %') and (command like '%-queuereporting%' or command like '%-responsepester%')))
